ComicInfo.Summary:
Jay and Mania’s cross-time, KISS chasing adventure continues as they track down the hard rocking band of thieves to retrieve the Demon King’s sword and attempt to keep Jay’s soul from being permanently trapped in the barren desert known as The Waste Land!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Stuart Sayger | 1 | B | Cover B | Ruairi Coleman | 2 | C | Cover C | Rodney Buchemi | 3 | D | Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Ruairi Coleman | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 7 |
